div.p: Share a memory of a holiday. Where was it, who went, what happenedâ€¦?

Last December , my uncle came to visit her brothers here in Belgium,Coming f of cameroon , he suffered all the days because his heatly wasn't good , he stayed always in the bedroom, but happily like a miracle ,the christmas day he stayed beside of us, singing , dancing, and jumping on feet, with all the family, and for the dinner he gave us advice and ask you to stay always together,before to die when he is back to cameroon; it was our amazing last christmas.
